name.value: Visit the Github repository for more information

description.value: An entry that, when resolved, returns all of the active entity references in a given code system. This includes all entity references that appear as the source of one or more statements in the code system, whether the assertions are made directly by a version of the code system or indirectly by a version of a different code system that is imported. Note that targets are not included to prevent codes from rdf, rdfs, owl, etc being included in this resolution set.

definition.value: An entry that, when resolved, returns all of the active entity references in a given code system. This includes all entity references that appear as the source of one or more statements in the code system, whether the assertions are made directly by a version of the code system or indirectly by a version of a different code system that is imported. Note that targets are not included to prevent codes from rdf, rdfs, owl, etc being included in this resolution set.

short.value: A reference to the code system whose codes are to be included

definition.value: A reference to the code system whose codes are to be included.

short.value: A reference to the specific version of the code system to include

definition.value: A reference to the specific version of the code system to include. If not supplied, the specific version of the code system is determined in the resolution call itself.
